Here's what I've got: Odd Todd is solid for chip generation. Blackboard is key, giving a massive x3 mult if hand-held cards are Spades/Clubs. Stencil is at x2, but could be better with an open slot. Constellation is currently at x1, but has potential if I get Planet cards. The Justice consumable is in my inventory. Flush is leveled at 17, giving a base of 275 chips and 36 mult. I played a Flush last round, for about 80,000 chips.

Now for the shop: The Hermit: could double my money to $8 if I bought and used it right now, which doesn't seem very efficient. The Wily Joker: offers +100 chips for a 3-of-a-kind. So, evaluating the options: The Hermit is only really worthwhile later, and Wily Joker is counterproductive for my build. Boosters and Vouchers are out of reach. There is really no upside here in the shop. I can either buy and hold the Hermit, or move to the next round. Selling Justice to get $5 so I can use Hermit, is less helpful than the next round reward. Odd Todd offers chip generation.

What if I sell Odd Todd? I'll have $6. Then I can buy a Jumbo Arcana Pack. But is that worth it? Arcana packs *could* give Planets to power up Constellation or Tarots to fix my deck (ensure Blackboard triggers). With the Ante 8 difficulty spike, that's not a bad idea. Odd Todd gives roughly +62 to +93 chips per hand. Is sacrificing that worth the pack? Arcana might give me a Jupiter card to level up my Flush, or a card that helps my deck, or something else. I might sell the Odd Todd card to give me more money. But I have Constellation! If I buy the Arcana Pack, and it has a Planet, my Constellation will get a boost. If I sell Justice and Odd Todd, I'd have enough for a pack, so I could buy it!

But let me double-check the calculations. The Hermit isn't helpful. Selling Justice won't get me enough. I could get a pack but lose Odd Todd. If I skip this round, I could generate more money from the next round. Selling Odd Todd and buying an Arcana Pack might improve my build. However, is that better than simply winning the next round?

I have a Flush that's doing pretty well, but could get better. I should run the calculations on Odd Todd. Lvl 17 Flush is 275 chips with a base of 36 mult. The value of Odd Todd's chip increase is around 62. I could have a really good hand. A good flush now will generate more chips than an average run with the Arcana pack. Is the risk of Arcana worth it?

Maybe I should proceed to `round_select` and generate more money. I can sell the pack later. I could keep the Hermit in the shop, but it is not that helpful. Since I'm on Ante 8, immediate power is more helpful than generating money. The odds of a good Planet card are low.

Okay, I'm going to `round_select`. Nothing in the shop seems like an immediate upgrade. Buying Hermit and using it is a waste. Selling Justice for a random card is also a bad trade. Selling Odd Todd is a mistake. I need to get planets to scale Constellation!

Conclusion: The shop is a waste of money. Nothing is worth the cost. Time to proceed to the next round.
